org.ow2.proactive.scheduler.common.util.logforwarder

Interface LogForwardingProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProActiveBasedForwardingProvider, SocketBasedForwardingProvider, SocketWithSSHTunnelBasedForwardingProvider

    public interface LogForwardingProvider
    This interface should be implemented by all log forwarding methods. It provide protocol-specific log server and appenders. Appenders are wrapped in an AppenderProvider to be sent over the network and created/activated on the remote side.
    See Also:
    LogForwardingService

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AppenderProvider createAppenderProvider(URI serverURI)
      Create an appender provider (i.e.
      URI createServer(LoggingEventProcessor eventProcessor)

      void terminateServer()

    • Method Detail

      • createAppenderProvider

        AppenderProvider createAppenderProvider(URI serverURI)
                                 throws LogForwardingException
        Create an appender provider (i.e. a container for appender). This provider is serializable and can be remotely sent. Note that a specific AppenderProvider implementation must be provided with a specific LogForwardingProvider implementation.
        Parameters:
        serverURI - the URI of the server that receives logging events appended in the contained appender.
        Returns:
        a container for an appender.
        Throws:
        LogForwardingException - if the provider cannot be created.

      • createServer

        URI createServer(LoggingEventProcessor eventProcessor)
          throws LogForwardingException
        Create locally a server that is able to receive logging events from the appender created by createAppenderProvider.
        Returns:
        the URI to reach this server.
        Throws:
        LogForwardingException - if the server cannot be created.

      • terminateServer

        void terminateServer()
              throws LogForwardingException
        Terminate the server created by createServer().
        Throws:
        LogForwardingException - if the server cannot be terminated.
